data.title: kahshin050332
data.text:
1971 ‧ Establishment of Chunghwa Picture Tubes Ltd. (Tao yuan Plant)

‧ Start building Tao yuan Monocolor Plant.

1974 ‧ 12″, 19″ CRT export to Middle and South America and Europe.

‧ 9″, 19″ CRT export to Thailand and European countries.

‧ Acquired USA and CSA certification.

1987 ‧ Yang Mei Plant Color Plant (Accomplish in 300 days)

‧ Establish CPT (Yang Mei Plant)

‧ Establish Color CRT Research Team.

‧ GPM FRAME Plan start production.

1990 ‧ Honored with MOEA Excellent Export Manufacturer

‧ Honored by Labor Council Superior Automation Plant Award.

1997 ‧ 17″ 0.27/0.25 mm Color Monitor MP

‧ TFT LCD Technical transfer from Mitsubishi ADI

‧ Fu Chou Mono Color Plant acquire ISO-9002 certificate

‧ TFT Plant 1 break earth

‧ Yang Mei Plant acquire ISO-14001 certificate

‧ CPT (GB) grand opening

‧ Honored with Highest Accomplishment Award by Optoelectric Association

1998 ‧ 15″ 1 pin dynamic focus tubes MP

‧ Honored by the 2nd National Prominent Optoelectric Products

‧ Taoyuan Plant acquire ISO-14001certificate

‧ Honored by Prominent Information Products Application Award

‧ Fu Chou Color Plant A acquired ISO-9002 certificate

‧ PDP substratum and prototype development

2003 ‧ 10″ FS, 29″ RF and 7″ projection tube MP

‧ Lungtan Plant acquired ISO-9001 certificate

‧ Lungtan Plant Bonded Factory Takeover Ceremony

‧ Lungtan Plant 2 break earth

‧ 46 PDP honored with Prominent Optoelectric Product Award

‧ First in Taiwan the MP 15.4 NookBook module

‧ 17″ FPM module and 13″ TV module MP

‧ Wujiang LCM Plant 2 MP

‧ Lungtan TFT-LCD Plant 1 MP

‧ Accomplish develop of PDP 46″ WVGA high luminance/high resolution models

‧ Establishment of CPT (TFT Lungtan Plant)

‧ Lungtan Plant Multi-Function Gymnasium Grand Opening and Lungtan Plant 1 Full Run Commencement Ceremony

2008 ‧ Conferred “Happy & Health Company Award” by the CommomWealth.

‧ Produced the first piece of backlight module at FVD.

‧ Held a Small & Medium-sized Backlight Module MOVE-IN ceremony in CPTF Optronics.

‧ Signed a contact with Sintek Photronic Corp. to acquire its CF G3.5 and G4.5 Plants.

‧ Conferred the Second Remarkable Enterprise Award by Taoyuan County Government.

‧ Signed a NT$ 4 billion syndicated loan agreement to complete the phase two capacity expansion project for the G6 Color Filter (CF) fab.

‧ The President of FDT, Mr. Luke Kang, represented CPT to make a Sichuan Earthquake donation of RMB3,000,000 to Fujian Branch Red Cross Society of China.

‧ Received the rewards of Outstanding Industry Contribution and of Excellent Product from Color Imaging Industry Promotion Office (CIPO) of the Ministry of Economic Affairs four times in a roll on its 15.4” Color Sequential Display and 2D/3D Switchable.

‧ Ranked the 26th place in the Info Tech 100 list in the BusinessNext and the 24th place in the Manufacture 1,000 list in the CommomWealth.

‧ Celebrated the acquisitions of the 2 CF production lines from Sintek Photronic Corp. located at Hu Kou.

‧ Built small- and medium-sized modules manufacture and celebrated the 100,000,000th CRT being produced at CPTF.

‧ Conferred the Gold Trading Award Excellent Exporter by Ministry of Economic Affairs (MOEA).

‧ Received a certificate of Environmental Production Declaration.

‧ Joined the 90th Tatung Athletic Tournament.

‧ Held a party “CPT Family Day”

‧ Conferred “Friendly Work Place” by Council of Labor Affairs.

‧ Launched “Innovation Plan” to announce the approach of the Knowledge Economy Age

2009 ‧ Received the 17th “Taiwan Excellence Awards” from Ministry of Economic Affairs R.O.C. for 37” Multi-view 3D TV Module and 15.4” 2D/3D Switchable NB Module

‧ Small & Medium-sized Business Unit manufactured the 100,000,000th S&M-sized panel.

‧ Bestowed “Excellent Product Award” by Ministry of Economic Affairs Industrial Development Bureau for 37” Multi-layers 3D Monitor Module.

‧ Conferred 12th “Outstanding Photonics Product Award” from Photonics Industry and Technology Development Association for 26” Multi-view 3D LCD TV panel.

‧ Achieved “Gold Trading Award Excellent Exporter” from Ministry of Economic Affairs International Trade.

‧ The first panel maker to pass and receive Windows 7 Single-Touch Logo certification.

‧ Honored with “Quality Improvement” by Ministry of Economic Affairs Industrial Development Bureau.

‧ Held a “CPT Family Day” event.

‧ Board of Directors appointed Mr. S. C. Lin to act as Deputy CEO of the company.

‧ Honored with “Grand Prix for Best Overall Investor Relations- Small or Mid-cap (Taiwan)” by IR Magazine Hong Kong and Taiwan Awards 2009
